fixes.name: Selected Year Filter
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced row-level column reference [TransactionDate] with 'accounts+'[TransactionDate] and mapped the Tableau parameter [Parameters].[Select Year] to SELECTEDVALUE('Select Year'[Display As]). The expression returns a boolean comparing the transaction year to the selected parameter value.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
